title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When I click on the first Combo, it doesn't take focus. It only takes focus if I drop down the combo list.
EB: When I click on the first Combo, it should take focus.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Locate the first Combo.
3. Click on the first Combo.
4. Observe if it takes focus.
5. Drop down the combo list and observe if it takes focus.
